trans-unit.source: Enables users to change page-related print settings, including margins and paper orientation.
trans-unit.target: Permite que os utilizadores alterem a página de definições relacionadas com a impressão, incluindo as margens e a orientação do papel.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The PageSetupDialog dialog box modifies the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> information for a given <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.Document%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A caixa de diálogo PageSetupDialog modifica as <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>informações</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> e para uma determinada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.Document%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.Document%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: The user can enable sections of the dialog box to manipulate printing and margins; paper orientation, size, and source; and to show Help and network buttons.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode ativar secções da caixa de diálogo para manipular a impressão e as margens; orientação do papel, tamanho e origem; Mostrar a ajuda e botões de rede.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.MinMargins%2A> property defines the minimum margins a user can select.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.MinMargins%2A>propriedade define as margens mínimo, um utilizador pode selecionar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.MinMargins%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of the PageSetupDialog class, the read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria uma instância da classe PageSetupDialog, as propriedades de leitura/escrita são definidas para valores iniciais.

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista destes valores, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because a PageSetupDialog needs page settings to display, you need to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.Document%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.PrinterSettings%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.PageSettings%2A> property before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>; otherwise, an exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: Porque um PageSetupDialog necessita de definições de páginas para apresentar, tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.Document%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.PrinterSettings%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.PageSettings%2A>propriedade antes de chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>; caso contrário, ocorrerá uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.PageSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.PrinterSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog.Document%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog> is created, the following properties are initialized to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog>é criada, as seguintes propriedades são inicializadas aos valores especificados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowMargins%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowOrientation%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowPaper%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowPrinter%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.Document%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.MinMargins%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.PageSettings%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.PrinterSettings%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.ShowHelp%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.ShowNetwork%2A>|`true`| You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowMargins%2A>| `true`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowOrientation%2A>| `true`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowPaper%2A>| `true`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowPrinter%2A>| `true`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.Document%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.MinMargins%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.PageSettings%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.PrinterSettings%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.ShowHelp%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.ShowNetwork%2A>| `true`| Pode alterar o valor para qualquer uma destas propriedades através de uma chamada para a propriedade separada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.ShowNetwork%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.ShowHelp%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.PrinterSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.PageSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.MinMargins%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.Document%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowPrinter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowPaper%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowOrientation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog.AllowMargins%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the margins section of the dialog box is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a secção de margens da caixa de diálogo está ativada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the margins section of the dialog box is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiver ativada a secção de margens da caixa de diálogo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the orientation section of the dialog box (landscape versus portrait) is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a secção de orientação da caixa de diálogo (horizontal versus vertical) está ativada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the orientation section of the dialog box is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiver ativada a secção de orientação da caixa de diálogo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the paper section of the dialog box (paper size and paper source) is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a secção de documento da caixa de diálogo (tamanho do papel e origem do documento) está ativada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the paper section of the dialog box is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiver ativada a secção de documento da caixa de diálogo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Printer** button is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o **impressora** botão está ativado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **Printer** button is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o **impressora** botão está ativada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> to get page settings from.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica o <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> para obter as definições de página do.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> to get page settings from.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> para obter as definições de página do.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the margin settings, when displayed in millimeters, should be automatically converted to and from hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as definições de margem, quando apresentadas em milímetros, devem ser automaticamente convertidas para e de centésimos de uma polegada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> class measures <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in hundredths of an inch, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog> allows users to set margins in inches or millimeters depending on the culture settings for the system running the application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>classe medidas <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName>no centésimos de uma polegada, mas o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog>permite aos utilizadores definir as margens em polegadas ou milímetros consoante as definições de idioma para o sistema que executa a aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PageSetupDialog> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, you should set this property to `true` if your application could be used in cultures that measure document margins in millimeters.
trans-unit.target: No .NET Framework versão 2.0, deve definir esta propriedade para `true` se a aplicação pode ser utilizada em culturas medem as margens do documento em milímetros.

trans-unit.source: If you are doing this conversion yourself, as was required in versions of the .NET Framework earlier than version 2.0, you should use the default value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se está a fazer esta conversão por si, conforme exigido em versões do .NET Framework anterior à versão 2.0, deve utilizar o valor predefinido de `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the margins should be automatically converted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as margens devem ser automaticamente convertidas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the minimum margins, in hundredths of an inch, the user is allowed to select.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica as margens mínimas, no centésimos de uma polegada, o utilizador tem permissão para selecionar.

trans-unit.source: The minimum margins, in hundredths of an inch, the user is allowed to select.
trans-unit.target: As margens mínimas, no centésimos de uma polegada, o utilizador tem permissão para selecionar.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the page settings to modify.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica as definições de página para modificar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"></xref> to modify.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings"> </xref> para modificar.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer settings that are modified when the user clicks the Printer button in the dialog.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as definições de impressora que são modificadas quando o utilizador clica no botão impressora na caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"></xref> to modify when the user clicks the Printer button.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings"> </xref> modificar quando o utilizador clica no botão impressora.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Resets all options to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Repõe a todas as opções para os respetivos valores predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Help** button is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o **ajudar** botão está visível.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **Help** button is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o **ajudar** botão está visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **Network** button is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o **rede** botão está visível.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **Network** button is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o **rede** botão está visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
